q4: It was often difficult locating the article in the 'traditional' condition. One reason being the article was often displaced to the edge of the screen, another being several clicks were necessary before the scrolling function could be used.
q5: I noticed that AutoComPaste seems to be less effective for copying and pasting phrases as the entire sentence would be pasted. Perhaps one means to improve this would be to allow users to specify where they would like to truncate their selection for pasting.
